name: Technology & Software
description: The technology and software industry encompasses companies involved in the development, manufacturing, and distribution of technology products and services. This includes software engineering, artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, data science, and emerging technologies.

domains.name: Software Engineering
domains.description: The discipline of designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software systems using engineering principles.

domains.name: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
domains.description: The domain covering the development, training, deployment, and operation of artificial intelligence and machine learning systems.
